records.welldyne module¶

WellDyne Records

Handles the record structures for the Welldyne service

class records.welldyne.AdHoc(record={}, custom={})¶

Bases: RestOC.Record_MySQL.Record

classmethod noFeedback(older_than, custom={})¶

No Feedback

Looks for triggers of a certain age that have not been opened, shipped, cancelled, and have no outbound error or record in the never started

Parameters

  • older_than (uint) – A timestamp representing the minimum age to check

  • custom (dict) – Custom Host and DB info ‘host’ the name of the host to get/set data on ‘append’ optional postfix for dynamic DBs

Returns

dict[]

classmethod withErrorsEligibility(crm_type, crm_id, custom={})¶

With Errors & Eligibility

Fetches the latest trigger associated with the customer, including any possible never started, outbound, and eligibility data

  • crm_id (str) – The ID of the customer to look up
